ygData.subject: Re: Yargon sighs clearly dissapointed
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, groups like that suck royally. It really sucks when you are semi-high level when people SHOULD know there roll in the group. You designate a healer and
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, groups like that suck royally. It really
sucks when you are semi-high level when people SHOULD
know there roll in the group. You designate a healer
and they waste precious mana nukeing or tanking,
nukers who waste nukes on greenies the tank can handle
=P all this results in a lot of wasted down time. If
you read my Cazic-Thule fighting reccomendations you
know that I only nuke once per lost tank bubble. Keeps
them from aggroing on me....most of the time. I also
use Screaming Terror on extras if I can get to them.
(mez spell) At level 33 my group had people who didn't
follow group proceedures ( a guy who wasn't the
desegnated puller pulling crap). I hear the tank say ZONE
(he was our evac caller) so I hit harmshield and ZOOM
out of the Tae room. I manage to zone, utterly oom
but with a full health bar, and the idiots in the
group yell at the tank and I for running (we lived they
didn't) sorry boys and girls but when the person we all
agree on to yell run actually assesses the situation
and knows we are going to die if we don't zone yells
run, then you better run! Hesitation will kill you AND
the tank who has to pause to save your ass while
telling you "@(&*^@ I SAID ZONE!!!!" Running isn't
fun....but better YOU die than me for your
stupidity.<br><br>well there is my rant =P~~~~~<br><br>Next time your
friend pulls something you KNOW you can't take DON'T hit
it! Tell him to run to the zone. If you don't touch
it, it won't aggro on you if you get out of the way.
It's no fun to watch a friend die but it's his own
fault.<br><br>Aeday Femmefatel <The Dark Lords><br>level 34
(got it last night in Cazic) DEL Necro<br>Xegony
server
